channel.title: Ranks
channel.description:
alright, i need to ask a few questions and add a few compliments
Cba to post WTF?
Junior Member .. Okay
Member :D
senior Member, THANK GOD FOR SMF
alright, what is a community member, like how do you get it, 50 Reputation, or are you voted in by other community members,
On to vet, what is a vet, i really don't know, Moparscape vet, Do they have visual warn or something?
Are Community members and Moparscape Vet's just cool ranks with Orange and Green Colors? i would like some answers.

Read full topic

item.title: Ranks
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:31, topic:204237”][quote author=Uriko link=topic=269723.msg2215919#msg2215919 date=1210183787]

Community Member and Moparscape Vet receive no moderation-orientated permissions. Vets are also ‘lower’ than their Community Member counterparts in a sense, as Community Members can see both a section here and all sections on Moparscape.
Other than that, all other ranks are post count based (with the exception of the ‘Has to take quiz’ rank, which is obviously the initial rank). Contrary to what someone mentioned before, CBA to post does not mean the person has failed the quiz; it means that they have passed it (thus removing the ‘has to take quiz’ rank) yet have chosen to not post.

Obviously ranks like global moderator are bestowed upon trustworthy members of the community; reputation/post count is irrelevant when selecting people for these positions (we do not consider post count as a sole indicator of a user’s activity).
[/quote]TBH Community Members should be given some sort of new awesomeness.

Locking.[/quote]
I’m pretty sure you guys can lock your own topics.

Read full topic

[quote=“Uriko, post:20, topic:204237”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=269723.msg2215902#msg2215902 date=1210182318]
Community Member and Moparscape Vet receive no moderation-orientated permissions. Vets are also ‘lower’ than their Community Member counterparts in a sense, as Community Members can see both a section here and all sections on Moparscape.
Other than that, all other ranks are post count based (with the exception of the ‘Has to take quiz’ rank, which is obviously the initial rank). Contrary to what someone mentioned before, CBA to post does not mean the person has failed the quiz; it means that they have passed it (thus removing the ‘has to take quiz’ rank) yet have chosen to not post.

Obviously ranks like global moderator are bestowed upon trustworthy members of the community; reputation/post count is irrelevant when selecting people for these positions (we do not consider post count as a sole indicator of a user’s activity).
[/quote]TBH Community Members should be given some sort of new awesomeness.[/quote]
Locking.

Read full topic

item.title: Ranks
item.dc:creator: @Aaron2 Aaron;
item.description:
@Aaron2 wrote:

[quote=“billygotshot, post:29, topic:204237”][quote author=Aaron; link=topic=269723.msg2215707#msg2215707 date=1210150007]

I get moody easily. So sometimes I may be pissed off at any dumb ass that happens to misspell a word, and then help someone with a problem they may be having in the next. If you have your rep removed you lose your rank as well I’m sure.

Thats the most Fucking Stupid Thing thats happened to an Economy if you lose your rep you lose your rank if you were nice to people, and calm and earned that reputation, and if you request 0 Just so you don’t get Pressured to Fucking rep Someone you lose your God damn Rank? … Wow
[/quote]

If you lose your rep you most likely lost it because it was your fault and you do not deserve it. If you do not deserve some numbers under your name then you do not deserve a title either.[/quote]

ook…

Read full topic
